According to the World Health Organization, motorcycles are the most dangerous form of transportation, accounting for over 25% of all road traffic deaths annually. In 2018, there were over 1.35 million deaths due to road traffic accidents worldwide, with motorcycles accounting for over 330,000 of those deaths.
According to the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, in 2018, there were 4,985 motorcyclist fatalities in the United States due to accidents involving motorcycles.
